data.title: Life Story Funeral Home, Traverse City
data.meta_description: Beverly Elaine Graham, 83 of Traverse City, died Saturday, June 16, 2018. She was born in Traverse City on December 15, 1934 the daughter of Cyril and Thelma “Peggy” (Kelley) Knight.
data.text:
Beverly Elaine Graham, 83 of Traverse City, died Saturday, June 16, 2018.

She was born in Traverse City on December 15, 1934 the daughter of Cyril and Thelma “Peggy” (Kelley) Knight.

Beverly previously worked as a caregiver at the Traverse City State Hospital and later as an in-home caregiver.

She enjoyed knitting, crocheting, traveling and gardening.

Beverly is survived by her children, Ilene Reames, Carmen Kaltenbach, Christina Graham, Jennifer (John Buri) Delvecchio, Maureen (Mark Freye) Leonard, Robert (Joanne) Graham, Patrick Graham; 27 grandchildren, numerous great-great grandchildren; 1 great-great-grandchild and sisters, Trula (Matt) Gasior and Carol Hougton.

She is preceded in death by her parents, Cyril and Thelma Knight; husband, Arthur Graham; son, Daniel Kaltenbach; daughter Rebecca Kaltenbach, brother, Raymond Knight and grandson, Corey Matthews.

Funeral Services will be held 11am, Wednesday, June 20, 2018 at the new location of Life Story Funeral Home, 400 W. Hammond Rd. The family will greet friends starting at 10 am. Burial will be in the Evergreen Cemetery, Kingsley. Memorial Contributions may be made to a charity of choice. Please visit www.lifestorytc.com to sign the guestbook and share your thoughts and memories with the family.
